languages.text: "Тебе знакомо название "Пылающее возмездие"? Судя по всему, это некое пустотное судно. Оно было упомянуто в найденном мной документе Теодоры".
"Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."
languages.original_text: "Тебе знакомо название "Пылающее возмездие"? Судя по всему, это некое пустотное судно. Оно было упомянуто в найденном мной документе Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort."
"Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."
"Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort."
"Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort."
"Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort."

languages.text: “你听说过‘烈焰之怒号’这个名字吗？据我所知，这应该是某种虚空舰之类的东西。西奥多拉的其中一份文件里提到了这个名字。”
languages.original_text: "Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."

traits.locale_text: “你听说过‘烈焰之怒号’这个名字吗？据我所知，这应该是某种虚空舰之类的东西。”

languages.text: « Avez-vous entendu parler du Jugement Ardent ? D'après ce que je sais, ce serait une sorte de vaisseau spatial. L'un des documents de Théodora en faisait mention. »
languages.original_text: "Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."

traits.locale_text: « Avez-vous entendu parler du Jugement Ardent ? D'après ce que je sais, ce serait une sorte de vaisseau spatial. L'un des documents de Théodora en faisait mention. »

languages.text: «¿Le suena el nombre de Juicio Abrasador? Por lo que tengo entendido, es una nave del vacío de alguna clase. La mencionaba uno de los documentos de Theodora».
languages.original_text: "Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."

traits.locale_text: «¿Le suena el nombre de Juicio Abrasador? Por lo que tengo entendido, es una nave del vacío de alguna clase».

languages.text: 「<灼炎の罰>という名に聞き覚えは？私の知る限り、ヴォイドシップかそれに類するものだ、見つけたシオドーラの資料の中に、その事が書かれていた」
languages.original_text: "Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."

traits.locale_text: 「<灼炎の罰>という名に聞き覚えは？ヴォイドシップかそれに類するものだと思うのだが」

languages.text: "Sagt Euch der Begriff 'Feurige Abrechnung' etwas? Meines Wissens ist das irgendein Raumschiff. Es wird in einem von Theodoras Dokumenten erwähnt, die ich gefunden habe."
languages.original_text: "Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr schon einmal den Namen Fiery Reckoning gehört? Das scheint ein Raumschiff zu sein."

languages.text: "Kıyamet Kadırgası ismini duydun mu hiç? Anladığım kadarıyla bir uçsuz gemisiymiş. Adı, Theodora'ya ait belgelerden birinde geçiyordu."
languages.original_text: "Have you ever heard the name Fiery Reckoning? From what I can tell, it is a voidship of some sort. There was a mention of it in one of Theodora's documents I found."

traits.locale_text: "Kıyamet Kadırgası ismini duydun mu hiç? Anladığım kadarıyla bir uçsuz gemisiymiş. Adı, Theodora'ya ait belgelerden birinde geçiyordu."
